evolution.translation[0].note_box[0].hea: – Meaning 1: the scientific idea that plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time
evolution.translation[0].note_box[0].sec: We can see signs of evolution taking place in the world around us.
Anthropologists can trace the evolution of plants and animals by examining fossils.
Our ancestors reached a key stage in human evolution when they began to stand up straight.
Every living creature has been formed by the slow process of biological evolution.
The environment plays a large part in the physical evolution of the species.
He expounded the theory that language is the product of Darwinian evolution.
Many Christians find it impossible to accept Darwin's theory of evolution.
evolution.translation[0].note_box[1].hea: – Meaning 2: the gradual change and development of an idea, situation, or object
evolution.translation[0].note_box[1].sec: The social system is undergoing continuous evolution to adapt to these rapid changes.
